University Contact Information (external link)SAA DepartmentsStanford AlumniWelcome HomeStanford Alumni Association helps you keep Stanford close wherever you are. Stanford Alumni AssociationAll Stanford, all together, all in one place. All right now.The Alumni Directory just got a major upgrade! Update your profile today and start making more meaningful connections in the only place where everyone is a verified Stanford alum. Modernized fields, filters, and settings make it easier to find and connect with alumni, curate your profile, access My Account, and more.Explore the DirectoryStoriesExplore news, views and perspectives from Stanford and your alumni community.Stanford Celebrates 13 Women’s History Makers (external link)from Stanford NewsLearn about the Stanford women who have fought for hard-won accomplishments in medicine, math, athletics, business, law, economics, administration, public service and  space.7 Impacts of Working From Home (external link)from Stanford ReportStanford scholar Nicholas Bloom details how working from home is affecting the office, our homes, and more.The Science of Skin (external link)from STANFORD magazineChemical engineer Zhenan Bao strives to re-create nature’s ultimate electronic system.Explore more storiesUpcoming EventsPeek at some alumni events happening just around the corner.May03Event: Cubberley Lecture Series: An Evening with Juliana Urtubey (external link)Date: Wednesday, May 3, 2023 | 5:30 PM - 7:00 PM PDTThis event is virtual: In person & onlineOrganizer | Graduate School of EducationView more eventsTravel/StudyDitch the Road Trip for the Journey of a LifetimeThis summer share your enthusiasm for travel and your love of learning with the whole family on one of our trips uniquely tailored for a range of ages and interests. Jun24–toJul03Galápagos IslandsWith Young Explorer Program for kids ages 6+Enjoy a family cruise through the remote island chain and encounter unique wildlife up close, including playful sea lions, giant tortoises and blue footed boobies. Jul06–toJul17JapanWith Young Explorer Program for kids ages 6+Discover Japan with your family and learn about Samurai practices, see meticulously sculpted gardens and relish the artistically crafted cuisine. Jul18–toJul29Southern AfricaWith Young Explorer Program for kids ages 6+Bring the family on safari in Chobe National Park and Sabi Sands, marvel at the incomparable Victoria Falls, and delve into South Africa’s turbulent history in Cape Town.Explore more family trips (external link)Lend a Hand in Your CommunityGo Beyond the Farm on May 6, 2023.Come together with Stanford alumni, family, and friends to help a cause in your community. Find a service project that speaks to you, and join in to make a difference. Sign up—volunteer slots fill up fast!Sign up to volunteer (external link)Programming With a PurposeThere’s something for everyone at Stanford Alumni. We’re here to help you connect, learn and grow every step of the way.Career ConnectionsLooking to make a career change or network with other alumni?
